section.title: Test Campaigns
section.p: This table lists all the test campaigns associated with the currently selected product.
To navigate to a test campaign, click on the link in the 'Name' column.
Use the 'Play' icon to execute a test campaign.
To delete an individual test campaign, click the 'Delete' icon.
Table results can be filtered by entering a search term in the filter box at the top of each column. Filter options are: '=': equal to, '!=': not equal to, and '~': contains.

section.title: Filter Test Campaigns
section.p: Test Campaigns may be filtered by product, drop, feature and components. Note: drops and components are only available for certain products.
Test campaigns may span multiple components and when filtering by component it should be noted that the the filter mechanism is a logical OR filter.
That is: show the test campaigns that have at least 1 component matching at least 1 value selected in the component dropdown.

section.title: Copy Test Campaigns
section.p: Test campaigns can be copied between drops.
Test campaigns that match the selected filters will be copied to the selected drop.
